lead_paragraph: Craig Biggio became the 27th player to reach 3,000 career hits with a single to center field in the seventh inning of the Houston Astros’ 11-inning, 8-5 victory against the Colorado Rockies last night.
snippet: Craig Biggio became the 27th player to reach 3,000 career hits with a single to center field in the seventh inning of the Houston Astros’ 11-inning, 8-5 victory against the Colorado Rockies last night.
